channel.title: Sessions on Ubucon Europe 2022

item.title: Closing session
item.description: Let’s wrap up this year’s 2 days the Ubucon Europe! And see you on next year!(Maybe in-person?)

item.title: Welcome and Opening Remarks
item.description: This session will cover how and why we have organized the UbuCon Europe event. We’ll also introduce our host organizing communities, sponsors and partner communities. About the speaker Something
